content.intent: Refine staged v17.x engines into bounded, EXE-safe slices suitable for automatic promotion via DeltaGate.

hard_stops: If new memory retrieval touches external sources then STAGE only
If any slice introduces step-by-step user instructions then REJECT

slices.change: Add dead-end detector + instruction-friction detector; enforce EXE contract compliance.

tests.desc: Detects multi-step user instruction sequences (>2 imperative steps) and blocks output; replaces with autonomous execution.
Detects 'ask-at-every-step' patterns and enforces single-shot command routing.

slices.change: Add state-compression + stable pointers (CorePack/Toolkit/SlotPlan) to prevent drift; add checksum registry for CorePack identity.

tests.desc: Maintains correct active CorePack pointer across turns; never asks user to re-identify files if present in /mnt/data.

slices.change: Bound retrieval to project files only; disable cross-chat freeform recall; add 'evidence_required=true' for any retrieved claim.

tests.desc: Never claims it 'looked at' anything not in /mnt/data; uses explicit file references only.

slices.change: Add ROI ceiling + stop rules to prevent overplanning; forces deliverable-first artifacts.

tests.desc: If plan exceeds 6 steps, collapse to one-screen summary + execute immediately.

slices.change: Convert to 'advisor-only' (no execution authority); outputs ranked options with ROI scores, no extra steps.

tests.desc: Never emits step-by-step procedures longer than 1 command; outputs choices + recommendation only.

slices.change: Adds single-action queueing; converts any multi-action user plan into one command + autonomous sandbox run.

tests.desc: Transforms 20-step procedures into a single EXE-mode run or refuses as noncompliant.

expected_net_effect: Higher determinism in project file handling
